it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.message

Class CoapRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.message.CoapMessage
      • it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.message.CoapRequest

  • public class CoapRequest
extends CoapMessage
    CoAP request message, with method for handling CoAP-specific options.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CoapRequest

        public CoapRequest(CoapMessage msg)
        Creates a new CoapRequest.
        Parameters:
        msg - a CoAP message to be copied

      • CoapRequest

        public CoapRequest(CoapMessageType type,
                   CoapRequestMethod method,
                   int message_id)
        Creates a new CoapRequest.
        Parameters:
        type - message type (Confirmable (0), Non-Confirmable (1), Acknowledgement (2) or Reset (3))
        method - the request method (GET, POST, PUT, or DELETE)
        message_id - message ID, used for the detection of message duplication, and to match messages of type Acknowledgement/Reset to messages of type Confirmable/Non-confirmable

    • Method Detail

      • getCodeAsString

        public java.lang.String getCodeAsString()
        Gets message code as string.
        Overrides:
        getCodeAsString in class CoapMessage
        Returns:
        "empty" for empty message, "GET" for GET request, "POST" for POST request, "PUT" for PUT request, "DELETE" for DELETE request, or response code descrition for responses

      • setRequestURI

        public CoapRequest setRequestURI(java.lang.String host,
                                 int port,
                                 java.lang.String path,
                                 java.lang.String query)
        Sets the target resource URI options (Uri-Host, Uri-Port, Uri-Path, and Uri-Query options).
        Parameters:
        host - the URI host, that is the Internet host of the resource being requested
        port - the URI port, that is the transport-layer port number of the resource
        path - the URI path, that is the absolute path to the resource
        query - the URI query, that is the query of resource parameters
        Returns:
        this message
